paper.title: A Fund Selection Robo-Advisor with Deep-learning Driven Market Prediction
paper.abstract: This paper proposes a new investment strategy with deep -learning market prediction for mutual fund portfolio optimization. Our strategy uses the capital asset pricing model (CAPM) that applies macroeconomic factors to predict whether the market is bull or hear. Then, we develop a robo-advisor (RA) to predict future market, optimize portfolio and automate investment. Experiments use 22 years' data of S&P500 and mutual funds of U.S. to validate our strategy. Results show that the accuracy of our market prediction method can reach 84.3% and the rate -of-return of our RA is 13.87%. Our model is more accurate and profitable than other algorithms.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用深度学习进行市场预测，并开发了一个robo-advisor来优化投资组合和自动化投资。这些内容明确指向投资组合管理领域，而非衍生品定价或金融风险管理。
